de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment

Class AbstractSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.AbstractSession
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PaySession, PaySharedSession

    public abstract class AbstractSession
extends java.lang.Object
    Project: LUIS ePayment

    PaySession is the first class to use in LUIS ePayment. It's the starting point to logon and receive a PayTerminal object for contacting the EFT.

    Version:
    $Revision: 1.5 $
    Author:
    M. Gelfort

    • Method Detail

      • exit

        public static void exit()
        This method stops the Java-VM by calling System.exit(). Invoke this method only, if the ePayment client process will not go down after regular logout. This may be the case in a LUIS ePayment SharedTerminalServer environment. The RMI objects may hinder a regular shutdown of LUIS ePayment client.
        Stopping the Java VM results in an immediate stop of the whole application!

      • getConfig

        public Configuration getConfig()
        Convenience method to receive the previously set PayConfiguration.
        Returns:
        The previously set PayConfiguration object.

      • isLoggedIn

        public boolean isLoggedIn()
        Questioning the PaySession, if a successfull logon has occured before.
        Returns:
        True, if one is logged in to the EFT, false otherwise.

      • logout

        public abstract void logout()
                     throws PayException
        Sends a logout command to the EFT.
        Throws:
        PayException - Every error results in a PayException or its devived classes.

      • getLanguage

        public java.lang.String getLanguage()
        Convenient method the get the previously set language of the EFT..
        Returns:
        String defining the language of the EFT display texts. Possible values are {"en", "de", "fr", "it"}.

      • setListener

        public void setListener(PayMessageListener newListener)
        A PayMessageListener is a client implementation of an interface to receive Events from LUIS ePayment.
        Parameters:
        newListener - Informs LUIS ePayment about a new PayMessageListener on the client side.

      • getListener

        public PayMessageListener getListener()
        Convenient method the get the previously set PayMessageListener.
        Returns:
        The previously set PayMessageListener.

      • getVersion

        public static java.lang.String getVersion()
        Static method to retrieve the LUIS ePayment version.
        Returns:
        The Version of LUIS ePayment as a String.

      • formatDate

        public java.lang.String formatDate(long milliSec,
                                   java.lang.String format)
        Converter method to change the long representation of a date to a human readable string.
        Parameters:
        milliSec - A long value, representing the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT
        format - A string value, defining a formatter pattern. Possible values are the same as defined in the Java class java.text.SimpleDateFormat
        • yyyy = year
        • MM = month (0-11)
        • dd = day of month (00-31)
        • HH = hour (00-24)
        • mm = minute (00-59)
        • ss = second (00-59)
          Returns:
          The string representation of the date, formatted in the defined way.
          See Also:
          SimpleDateFormat
